snippet.title: USC: Counterforce - Early Access Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574870/?utm_source=youtube_firesquid&utm_medium=video_teaser&utm_campaign=ea&utm_id=teaser_release&utm_content=teaser
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

USC: Counterforce's Early Access comes to Steam on July 25th.

USC: Counterforce is inspired by classic 90s tactical turn-based games. You will assume leadership of a team of marines dispatched to the planetary body M-8322 to investigate and destroy the alien forces stationed there. To overcome these fearsome foes, each marine is equipped with their own set of unique skills and passive abilities that have the potential to change the course of the battle.

In this Early Access, you are about to dive into a fight where tactical abilities will be your biggest asset. Experience fierce encounters and more in an immersive sci-fi atmosphere.
